Origins: An old photograph purportedly showing a child in a waste basket next to a sign that reads "Dispose of your ugly children here" took another viral lap around the internet after it was shared by the "History In Pictures" Twitter account on 30 November 2015. The above-displayed image has been circulating around the internet since at least 2007 when it was posted to the LOLHome web site. While its creator is still unknown, it is clear that someone altered the original photo to change the wording on the sign.
Description: The original 1928 photo, which is part of Getty Images "Best Of News" archive, shows a child in a waste basket next to a sign that reads "Please Keep Off The Grass": View image | gettyimages.com Last updated: 2 December 2015
Claim: A photograph shows a child in a wastebasket next to a sign that reads "Dispose of your ugly children here."
